timeline.message: Fix code review suggestion for cyclic unions
Add table type as anydata type
Add package data to cyclic unions
Fix intersection type double ignoring of fields
Fix identifying Types without names as equal
Fix assignability of xml subtype to anydata
Add readonly as pure type for `==` operator
Add cloneable as a predefinded type
Add cloneable as a predefinded type
Add json to Cloneable in SymbolTable
Change runtime json type to a union
Change runtime json, anydata to cyclic unions
Fix table type constraint in toString
Fix invalid cyclic flag addition to parent union
Fix union comparison for json type
Add type name for predefined unions
Fix test case updates for line numbers
Fix object type reference test case
Fix object type reference test case and error line
Fix test case error line numbers
Fix test case invalid token and words
Fix SO issue in method resolver
Fix cyclic types not resolving known types issue
Add support for master for cyclic union
Fix pure type for sub string types
Fix heap memory out of error

Improve heap/peak heap memory

BArrayState enum only needs capacity 3. BIRPackageSymbolEnter create
many collections with extra space. SymbolEnter on some cases initial
capacity will reduce memory. GlobalVariableRefAnalyzer improved to
return empty HashSets with capacity 0 on some cases.
Add teardown for several test cases
Add teardown for several test cases
Add teardown for several test cases

replies.bodyText: Not necessarily if someone creates one programmatically.
